EmailTemplate.name: BE Aero - No Quote
EmailTemplate.subject: BE Aero - No Quote
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This part number is no longer supported by Honeywell.
You will need to place your order directly with B/E Aerospace Consumables Management. http://www.beconsumables.com/cm/support/request_quote.cfm
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
Original Correspondence: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Description}
